targets.query: select status from  hosts where app =~ /^$application$/ and  host=~ /^$instance$/  and $timeFilter

select mean(normalized_servo_rest_totaltime)/mean(normalized_servo_rest_count) as total_response_time from $application.$retention.jvm where $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ group by time($interval)
select sum(normalized_servo_rest_count)*mean(interval)  as servo_rest_count from $application.$retention.jvm where $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ group by time(1m)
select mean(processors) as processors, mean(systemload_average) as systemload_average from  $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("threads") as threads,mean("threads_daemon") as daemon,mean("threads_peak") as peak FROM $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("classes") as classes, mean("classes_loaded") as loaded, mean("classes_unloaded") as unloaded FROM $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/  GROUP BY time($interval)

select mean(heap) as heap, mean(heap_committed) as committed , mean(heap_init) as init, mean(heap_used) as used from $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)

select mean("nonheap") as nonheap, mean("nonheap_committed") as committed, mean("nonheap_init") as init, mean("nonheap_used") as used from $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(/^gc_.*count$/)  FROM $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(/^gc_.*time$/) FROM $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
select mean("mem") as mem, mean("mem_free") as free from $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
select  up as up,down as down from healths WHERE app =~ /^$application$/ and  $timeFilter
SELECT status from hosts where app =~ /^$application$/ and  host=~ /^$instance$/
SELECT mean("instance_uptime") as instance_uptime, mean("uptime") as uptime FROM $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("httpsessions_active") as httpsessions_active, mean("httpsessions_max") as httpsessions_max  from $application.$retention.jvm WHERE $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
select   mean(res) as res  from  $application.$retention.request where $timeFilter and  host=~ /^$instance$/  group by api

list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM hosts WITH KEY = "host" where app=~ /^$application$/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM hosts WITH KEY = "host" where app=~ /^$application$/
